refnamediv.refpurpose: General function for modification of LEVELSET objects.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: gf_levelset_set(levelset LS, 'values', {mat v1|string func_1}[, mat v2|string func_2])

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: General function for modification of LEVELSET objects.

para.literal: gf_levelset_set(levelset LS, 'values', {mat v1|string func_1}[, mat v2|string func_2])

listitem.para:
Set values of the vector of dof for the level-set functions.
Set the primary function with the vector of dof v1 (or the expression func_1) and the secondary function (if any) with the vector of dof v2 (or the expression func_2)
Simplify dof of level-set optionally with the parameter eps.
